title: Sekai Meisaku Douwa: Hakuchou no Ouji (The Wild Swans)
synopsis: When a widower king loses his way in a dangerous forest, he is forced to take a witch's daughter as a second wife in order to escape. However, the newly crowned queen Greta quickly becomes jealous of the time the king spends with his children and vows her revenge. In the middle of the night, Greta sneaks to where the children are sleeping and turns six of the king's sons into swans, leaving the only daughter, Elisa, to fend for herself.
characters: ['Elisa', 'Fourth Prince', 'Second Prince', 'First Prince', 'Third Prince', 'King Friedrich', 'Greta', 'King Hilderbrand', 'Witch']
voices: ['Masuyama, Eiko', 'Furuya, Toru', 'Tsukase, Noriko', 'Komiyama, Kiyoshi', 'Kamiya, Akira', 'Iwasaki, Kaneko', 'Kondou, Yousuke', 'Sugiyama, Tokuko']
staff: [['Nishizawa, Nobutaka', ['Director']], ['Andersen, Hans Christian', ['Original Creator']], ['Komori, Akihiro', ['Music']], ['Chiba, Hideo', ['Art Director']]]
